short_summary: Pest control services are required for Atlantic Institution in Renous, New Brunswick
description: The Correctional Service of Canada requires the services of a reliable and experienced pest control contractor to provide services for Atlantic Institution in Renous, New Brunswick. Pest control services must be provided in a professional and timely manner to ensure the safety and well-being of inmates and staff. The contractor will be required to perform monthly inspections and provide preventative maintenance to prevent re-infestation. Additionally, the contractor will be responsible for providing extermination services for bees, wasps, and hornets nests, as well as other pest control services as required by the institution. The contract will be awarded to the contractor who provides the lowest-priced compliant bid.
full_summary:
## [Tender Announcement: Pest Control Services at Atlantic Institution](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/04/04/15c7a1e053584d209702ebd388045bfe/Pest_Control_RFP__Atlantic_Institution.pdf)

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking a contractor to provide pest control services at the Atlantic Institution in Renous, New Brunswick.

### Tender Details

*   **Tender Reference Number:** PW-22-01009982
*   **Amendment Number:** 0
*   **Publication Date:** October 13, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date:** November 22, 2022, at 12:00 PM EST
*   **Duration of Contract:** The Work is to be performed during the period of April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2024 with the option to renew for four (4) additional one-year periods.

### Scope of Work

The contractor must provide skilled licensed personnel to provide pest control services, including:

*   Elimination of existing pest problems and provision of recommendations regarding prevention
*   Monthly inspections of all structures and ground areas within the Institution
*   Preventative maintenance to prevent re-infestation
*   Extermination of bees, wasps, and hornets nests when required
*   Removal of forestry and domestic animals
*   Exterior treatment twice per year as determined by project authority
*   Availability 24 hours a day, 7 days a week for emergency services

### Evaluation Criteria

The selection of the contractor will be based on the lowest priced compliant bid.

### Contact Information

To obtain more information about this tender, please contact:

*   Matthew Couture
*  (matthew.couture@csc-scc.gc.ca)
*   506-378-8730

Note: The Contractor must be licensed in the Province of New Brunswick and must use only those products that fall under the Pest Control Product Act.

### Terms and Conditions

The documents can be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French). After contract award, bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process. Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within fifteen (15) working days of receipt of the results of the bid solicitation process.
